meanings.definition: The runic alphabet used by Germanic peoples.
meanings.sent1: The ancient futhark was essential for communication.
meanings.sent2: Learning the futhark helped me understand history better.
meanings.sent3: I tried writing a love letter using the futhark, but it looked like a secret code!
meanings.sent4: The futhark was like a key unlocking the mysteries of the past.
meanings.sent5: The intricate futhark symbols fascinated me with their beauty.

meanings.definition: A system of writing using runic characters.
meanings.sent1: The futhark symbols were used to write important messages.
meanings.sent2: Studying the futhark system revealed ancient stories.
meanings.sent3: I pretended to cast a spell using the futhark characters!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like the futhark, cryptic yet full of meaning.
meanings.sent5: The futhark script etched on the stone tablets was mesmerizing.
